metadata.title: CVE-2024-26765 on Ubuntu 22.04 LTS for NVIDIA BlueField (jammy) - medium

criterions.comment: linux-hwe-5.19: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'superseded by linux-hwe-6.2').

linux-bluefield package in bluefield/jammy is affected and needs fixing.
